name: Wiki's Wild Ride
description:
A 2D runner-style game where you play as Wiki, a surly and delusional calico cat on a quest to get her dinners back from her owners, "Dad" and "The Girl," by taking a wild ride through the house on her mighty steed--the family dog!

Collect cat treats and cat coins to buy upgrades between runs, and plan out your assaults on the various rooms of the house. The game has 10 "story" levels with unique boss fights, 17 "challenge" levels, and an endless mode.
